relnotes.name: Multimode TSY
relnotes.purpose: ETel TSY reference plugin for Multimode i.e. phones capable of accesing both GSM and GPRS networks. Replaced on an actual device by a hardware specific licensee TSY.

defect.title: Klocwork issues, NULL pointer can be used in release build telephony_cdmatsy

relnotes.defect: Improved handling of OOM conditions in CCallHayes

defect.title: Klocwork issues in mmtsy and simtsy

relnotes.defect: Removed a redundant condition check in CATCommands::Complete()

defect.title: MM.TSY panics on machines with no COMM::0

relnotes.defect: Fixed an MMTSY panic in machines with no COMM::0 port

defect.title: SAN : Making a data call from PhoneUI returns TimedOut Error

relnotes.defect: Fixed a problem in MMTSY initialisation

defect.title: Unhandled exception in MM.TSY when MultimodeInitL() leaves

relnotes.defect: Exception in MultimodeInitL is now handled correctly

defect.title: MMTSY does not support RMobilePhone::GetPhoneStoreInfo with 4 parameters

relnotes.defect: Support has been added for RMobilePhone::GetPhoneStoreInfo with 4 parameters

defect.title: MMTSY panics when phonebook entry names are passed that are too long...

relnotes.defect: Overflow condition now checked for long phonebook entry names
